程序包 com.geometry.ui.uiUtils

类 ColorScheme

java.lang.Object
com.geometry.ui.uiUtils.ColorScheme
public class ColorScheme extends Object
Color scheme manager for the application. Supports normal vision, red-green colorblind, and blue-yellow colorblind modes to ensure accessibility for users with different visual abilities. This class provides centralized color definitions that are used throughout the application UI.

      public ColorScheme()

  • 方法详细资料

    • getColor

      public static Color getColor(String colorName)
      Get color from current scheme by its semantic name. This method returns the appropriate color based on the active color scheme.
      参数:
      colorName - The semantic name of the color to retrieve (e.g., PRIMARY, SUCCESS)
      返回:
      The Color object corresponding to the name in the current scheme

    • setColorScheme

      public static void setColorScheme(int schemeType)
      Set the active color scheme. Changes the application's color scheme to accommodate different visual needs.
      参数:
      schemeType - The scheme type to activate (NORMAL_VISION, RED_GREEN_COLORBLIND, or BLUE_YELLOW_COLORBLIND)

    • getCurrentScheme

      public static int getCurrentScheme()
      Get the current scheme type.
      返回:
      The active scheme type (NORMAL_VISION, RED_GREEN_COLORBLIND, or BLUE_YELLOW_COLORBLIND)

    • getSchemeName

      public static String getSchemeName(int schemeType)
      Get scheme name from type. Converts the numeric scheme type to a human-readable string.
      参数:
      schemeType - The scheme type (NORMAL_VISION, RED_GREEN_COLORBLIND, or BLUE_YELLOW_COLORBLIND)
      返回:
      The scheme name as a descriptive string
